content.query:
-- Drop the external table if it already exists
IF OBJECT_ID('dbo.AgentsSkillCertificationTrack', 'U') IS NOT NULL
  DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.AgentsSkillCertificationTrack;


-- Re-create the external table with all columns as NVARCHAR
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.AgentsSkillCertificationTrack (
    [AGENT NAME] NVARCHAR(255),
    [FIELD-TRAINER] NVARCHAR(255),
    [Skill Level] NVARCHAR(255),
    [Trainer Efficiency] NVARCHAR(255),
    [AGENT COMPETENCY %] NVARCHAR(255),
    [IBA DATE] NVARCHAR(255),
    [CERTIFIED FIELD-TRAINER] NVARCHAR(255),
    [100% INDEPENDENT] NVARCHAR(255),
    [MASTER TRAINER] NVARCHAR(255),
    [HOW TO PROSPECT] NVARCHAR(255),
    [HOW TO SET APPOINTMENTS] NVARCHAR(255),
    [CREATE FNAS & PROPOSALS] NVARCHAR(255),
    [QBILIVE CERTIFICATION] NVARCHAR(255),
    [HOW TO PRESENT] NVARCHAR(255),
    [HOW TO CLOSE] NVARCHAR(255),
    [HOW TO RECRUIT] NVARCHAR(255),
    [HOW TO INTERVIEW A GUEST] NVARCHAR(255),
    [HOW TO FAST START A NEW RECRUIT] NVARCHAR(255),
    [HOW TO LICENSE A NEW RECRUIT] NVARCHAR(255),
    [HOW TO REPLACE A POLICY] NVARCHAR(255),
    [PRODUCT KNOWLEDGE MASTERY] NVARCHAR(255),
    [HOW TO OVERCOME OBJECTIONS] NVARCHAR(255),
    [THE MICROMANAGEMENT LOG] NVARCHAR(255),
    [THE 6-POINT GAMEPLAN] NVARCHAR(255),
    [THE DECADE OF DOMINANCE VISION] NVARCHAR(255),
    [Blnk Column] NVARCHAR(255)
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = '/fadata/processed/staging_agents_skill_certification_track/agents_skill_certification_track.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = MyAdlsGen2DataSource,
    FILE_FORMAT = CsvFormatAgents
);
